code: import React from'react';import'./Projects.css';import eduAIImage from'../assests/EduAI.png';import impactLinkImage from'../assests/ImpactLink.png';import cftcImage from'../assests/CFTC.png';import ecom from'../assests/ecom.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const projects=[{title:"EduAI",description:"A personalized AI-driven learning path dashboard that generates personalized learning paths based on user goals, skill levels, and career aspirations. Implemented complete e-commerce functionality with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and secure checkout process.",tags:["JavaScript","HTML","CSS","Node.js","MySQL"],liveLink:"#",codeLink:"#",image:ecom}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"projects",id:"projects",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Featured Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Some Things I've Built"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-container",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-image",style:{background:`url(${project.image||''}) center/cover no-repeat`,backgroundSize:'cover',backgroundPosition:'top center'},children:index<2?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.codeLink,className:"project-btn",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"View Code"})})}):null}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-tags",children:project.tags.map((tag,tagIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tag",children:tag},tagIndex))})]})]},index))})]});};export default Projects;
